sentences.en: a cautious approach to the crisis
A degree of cautious optimism is justified.
sentences.cn: 表现出一定程度的谨慎乐观是合乎情理的。

sentences.en: Australia, put in to bat, made a cautious start.
sentences.cn: 轮到澳大利亚队出场击球，他们开始打得很谨慎。

sentences.en: Be cautious in doing such a matter!
sentences.cn: 做这样事情要慎重从事!

sentences.en: Doctors are understandably cautious about this new treatment.
sentences.cn: 医生对这个新疗法很谨慎是可以理解的.

sentences.en: Employers may become overly cautious about taking on new staff.
sentences.cn: 雇主在雇用新职员时可能会变得过于谨慎。

sentences.en: He was cautious about his work.
He was cautious of his footing, wary of the edge.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地站在边缘。

sentences.en: He was very cautious about committing himself to anything.
sentences.cn: 他谨小慎微，从不轻易表态。

sentences.en: His conduct would be prudent and cautious; neither extreme nor ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 他的举止总是小心、谨慎, 既不偏激,也不拘谨.

sentences.en: His critics write him off as too cautious to succeed.
sentences.cn: 批评他的人不把他当回事，认为他太过谨慎，不能成事。

sentences.en: Huck was silent while he framed a duly cautious reply.
sentences.cn: 哈克没作声,心里却在精心编造,好回答他提出的问题.

sentences.en: Investors are playing it cautious, and they're playing it smart.
sentences.cn: 投资者审慎精明地行事。

sentences.en: On this account we should be more cautious on this voyage.
sentences.cn: 以此,我们应该在这次航行中格外小心谨慎.

sentences.en: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.cn: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

sentences.en: We should not only be bold, but also be cautious.
sentences.cn: 我们不仅要大胆, 而且要谨慎.

sentences.en: You should be cautious when getting involved and test the water before committing yourself.
sentences.cn: 参与其中时一定要小心谨慎，表态之前最好试探一下。

trans.tran_en: careful to avoid danger or risks
